thread.title: Leaked Documents Reveal New Details About U.S. Drone Programs
thread.title_full: Leaked Documents Reveal New Details About U.S. Drone Programs

author: Susie Madrak
title: Leaked Documents Reveal New Details About U.S. Drone Programs
text:
sharethis 10/16/15 2:00pm A cache of leaked, classified slides, published as part of a series of articles by The Intercept on Thursday, sheds new light on the U.S. military’s covert, lethal drone operations in Afghanistan, Somalia and Yemen between 2011 and 2013. The documents, which an anonymous intelligence source leaked to the website, show, among other things, how the… Afghanistan , covert operations , drones , Somalia , The Intercept , yemen Comments
